title: Ticket #2020: Windows machine littered with stale execute directories.
description:
On startup my logs are filled with the following: 

04/01/11 08:17:42 ERROR: C:\condor\7_6\execute\dir_7016 still exists after tryin
g to add Full control to ACLs for PRIV_UNKNOWN
04/01/11 08:17:43 ERROR: C:\condor\7_6\execute\dir_7020 still exists after tryin
g to add Full control to ACLs for PRIV_UNKNOWN
04/01/11 08:17:44 ERROR: C:\condor\7_6\execute\dir_7100 still exists after tryin
g to add Full control to ACLs for PRIV_UNKNOWN
04/01/11 08:17:45 ERROR: C:\condor\7_6\execute\dir_7132 still exists after tryin
g to add Full control to ACLs for PRIV_UNKNOWN
remarks:
2011-Apr-01 15:10:35 by tstclair:
AVG Identity Guard was holding open the condor_exec.bat files in ever execute directory which was blocking it from deletion.
attachments: • condor_config 116211 bytes added by tstclair on 2011-Apr-01 14:15:53 UTC.
creator: tstclair
